title: Most Tense ICE & DHS Raid Moments Caught on Camera in 2025
description:
This year, the Trump Administration stayed true to its promise, working with immigration and customs enforcement officers to secure the countryâ€™s border and cities. The raids have led to heart-stopping caught on camera moments, and chaotic protests across the nation. 

Here are the most tense moments during ICE & DHS raids caught on camera in 2025.

#ice #raids #dhs
